text:
Question 61) Dubbing is the new field to be explored by artificial intelligence, and there are companies dedicated to making original actors voices transposed to other languages. The novelty reinforces the tendency to automate jobs in the most diverse areas. It has the potential to make life easier for studios and producers and at the same time make the opportunities for voice actors and actors who work with it scarce.
The consequence of the technological change presented in the text is the
A) Protection of the national economy.
B) appreciation of traditional culture.
C) decreased academic formation.
D) stagnation of the artistic manifestation.
E) expansion of structural unemployment.
